showerReviews.reviewText: … park was cloudy with a greenish tint to it...there were broken lights with wires showing, on the ground next to a shower...1 slide wasn't working at all and the flo-rider shut down several times during our stay for mechanical issues...the …

… river is lovely, the loungers are comfy and plentiful.  Towels are provided.  I asked staff and they said there are no change rooms, so we just had to change in the bathroom.  Not ideal, we would have liked a shower before the flight home.

showerReviews.reviewText: Great swimming pool. Friendly staff. Too bad the 50-meter long lanes are so seldom deployed. Had to make do with the 25-meter ones. The shower rooms needs an upgrade. Otherwise I'd give it 5 stars.
